entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
